summary.p: A pothi bound as a codex, from the collection of Charles d’Ochoa (1816-1846).

msItem.title: Bhagavadgītā

rubric.seg:
श्री गणेशाय नमः ॥ श्री कृष्नाय नमः ॥ श्री
गुरुभ्यो नमः ॥

msItem.incipit:
ॐ नमो जी भगवंता ॥ तुज
नमो जी अव्यक्ता ॥ कवित्व मती वसुदेव
सुता ॥ द्यावीमज ॥ १ ॥ मगनमू आदिश
क्ति ॥ जे जाणें परब्रह्म प्रकृति ॥ चैतन्य
माया विख्याति ॥ ते ईश्वर शक्ती नमस्का
रिली ॥ २ ॥ आता नमू विश्वजननी ॥ जेअ
msItem.explicit:
व्यासदेवो निरोपिता ॥ प्राकृत जा
ण आता ॥ ह्मणे ज्ञानदेवो ॥ १९ ॥
हे ब्रह्मबीज असे ॥ इस भजि जे स
र्वस्व ॥ निदिती ते परियेसे ॥ देव द्रो
ही ह्मने ज्ञान देवो ॥ २० ॥

collation.desc: 4 folios = guard leaves. No foliation. Element of codex binding. f[1]r marbled.
1 folio = front guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso.
65 folios = Bhagavadgītā: Text. Nāgarī foliation 1-65 (left and right margins of versos of the original pothi format). Library Arabic foliation 1-65 (top right of rectos of codex format)
1 folio = back guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso.
4 folios = guard leaves. No foliation. Element of codex binding. f[4]v marbled.

additions.desc:
Title printed in golden letters on the spine:
DNYANDEV. BHAGAVAT GUITA. M.S.S. PRAKRIT
BnF current shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 672 (front cover, verso).
Information to binder (?), in black ink (f[1]r): tête 31

Price calculation, in black ink (f[1]v):
65
6
{horizontal stroke}
390
That is, 6 (number of lines per page) by 65 (number of folios) = 390 (lines). This figure cover in fact only half of the manuscript since the calculation is based on the number of line per page multiplied by the number of folios.

origin.origDate: No internal date. Dated to the 19th century by Cabaton (1912), on unstated grounds. Not after Charles d'Ochoa (1816-1846).

provenance.p: From the collection of Charles d'Ochoa (1816-1846).

acquisition.p: Acquired in 1847. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 1 = Acquisitions: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1833-1848, nos. 4242-4486.

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 96, no. 672.

Tulpule, S. G. 1986. Un catalogue descriptif des manuscrits marathi dans la collection de Charles d'Ochoa de la Bibliothèque nationale Paris / A descriptive catalogue of the marathi manuscripts in the Charles d'Ochoa collection of the Bibliothèque Nationale Paris. Bulletin de l'Ecole française d'Extrême-Orient 75 (1986): 105-123. — See p. 116, no. 672: Gītāṭīkā, or a Commentary on the Bhagavadgitā, attributed to Jñānadeva which is not possible as the author pays his respects to Jñānadeva himself. The work is poor both in content and style.

encodingDesc.p: Original text encoded / transliterated in Devanāgarī script.
